#summary Eclipse Modeling for Semantic Web Toolkit
#sidebar StoreTableOfContents

= Introduction =

The Eclipse Modeling for Semantic Web (EMF4SW) Toolkit provides metamodels for Semantic Web modeling languages such as RDF and OWL 2.

Metamodels provided are :
 * [http://code.google.com/p/emftriple/wiki/EMF4SWMetamodels#RDF_metamodel RDF] (com.emf4sw.rdf)
 * [http://code.google.com/p/emftriple/wiki/EMF4SWMetamodels#OWL_metamodel OWL] 2 (com.emf4sw.owl)

Available Model Transformations:
 * Ecore to OWL (com.emf4sw.owl)
 * OWL to Ecore (com.emf4sw.owl)
 * UML to OWL (com.emf4sw.uml)
 * OWL to UML (com.emf4sw.uml)
 * Model to RDF (com.emf4sw.rdf.transform)
 * RDF to Model (com.emf4sw.rdf.transform)
